title: Best kids' toy advent calendars 2019 from Lego to Playmobil
text:
Advent calendars filled with chocolate treats have traditionally been the go-to for kids in the run-up to Christmas. And although everyone loves chocolate, there are an increasing number of fun alternatives to celebrate the most wonderful time of the year.

Toy advent calendars are all the rage at the moment and they're full of festive surprises, from Playmobil's version of Santa's Workshop to Lego City buildable toys.

So if you're looking for an alternative to little chocolate squares, here are the very best kids' toy advent calendars with daily gifts for the run-up to Christmas.



Currently a best-seller on Amazon, Playmobil advent calendar puts you right at the heart of Santa's Workshop as the elves prepare for Christmas.

The 24 exciting presents revealed in the run-up to December 25 include Santa's sleigh, a work bench, reindeer, bike and tons of toys, including plenty of accessories which are durable, brightly coloured and a good size for kids.

And once all of the gifts have been revealed, make sure you help Santa load up his sleigh to deliver the toys!

Buy now on Amazon

Lego's Harry Potter advent calendar lets you build your own fun festive scene from Hogwarts as you countdown to Christmas Day.

Behind each of the 24 doors is a surprise toy including seven much-loved characters from the books and films. These include Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley, Albus Dumbledore and Professor Flitwick, as well as a Hedwig figurine and a micro Hogwarts Express train. You can also build a fireplace with Christmas decorations to add to the festive Great Hall.

An Amazon best-seller for good reason, the Lego Harry Potter advent calendar will definitely provide you with a magical build-up to Christmas.

Buy now on Amazon

BIC's advent calendar offers something a bit different - every day there is a new surprise with felt pens, colouring pencils, crayons, erasers and more for the budding artist.

Also included are 24 coloured cards and 20 stickers depicting classic festive scenes, from a Christmas tree to a jolly reindeer, which will encourage kids to make their own Christmas cards as the big day approaches.





Buy now on Amazon

The innovative VTech Toot-Toot Animals Advent Calendar features 24 fun play pieces, including a cute SmartPoint reindeer that plays three Christmas songs, six festive melodies and lots of fun sound effects.

The box panel cleverly folds down to become a Toot-Toot Animals play area, and the advent calendar also includes surprises like a husky, polar bear and penguin, plus Christmas decorations and a Christmas tree hiding behind the calendar doors.

Buy now on Amazon

The Thomas & Friends Advent Calendar is another great option, featuring 24 MINIS behind each door in special Christmas-themed designs. Alongside all of the Thomas classics, new characters for 2019 include Rebecca and Nina - making the set ideal for collecting, racing and trading.

Buy now on Amazon

The massively popular Lego City advent calendar features 24 different items, including vehicles like a snowmobile and snow plow tractor, a snow fort and seven Lego City figurines from Santa Claus to a husky dog.

Each day comes with a brand new surprise, and as this is Lego, the great thing about the figurines hiding behind each door is that they can be used to add to other sets - meaning many more hours of fun through Christmas and beyond!

Buy now on Amazon
